Atlantis, The Palm.label: Atlantis, The Palm
Atlantis, The Palm.description: Atlantis, The Palm is a resort located on Dubai’s reclaimed artificial island The Palm. It was the first resort to be built on the island and is based on the myth of Atlantis includes distinct Arabian elements. Wikipedia
Address: Palm Jumeirah - Dubai - United Arab Emirates

Casapueblo.label: Casapueblo
Casapueblo.description: Casapueblo is the house of Uruguayan artist Carlos Páez Vilaró, located in Punta Ballena near Punta del Este, Uruguay. It is a homage to the artist's son Carlitos Paez, one of the sixteen survivors of the crash of Uruguayan Air Force Flight 571. Wikipedia

Jumeirah Beach Hotel.label: Jumeirah Beach Hotel
Jumeirah Beach Hotel.description: Jumeirah Beach Hotel is a hotel in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The hotel, which opened in 1997, is operated by the Dubai-based hotelier Jumeirah. The hotel contains 598 rooms and suites, 19 beachfront villas, and 20 restaurants and bars. Wikipedia
Address: Jumeirah Rd - Dubai - United Arab Emirates

The Peninsula Hong Kong.label: The Peninsula Hong Kong
The Peninsula Hong Kong.description: The Peninsula Hong Kong, located in Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong, is the flagship property of the The Peninsula Hotels group. Wikipedia

Ballathie House.label: Ballathie House
Ballathie House.description: Ballathie House is a 19th-century mansion in Perthshire, Scotland. It is located around 9 miles north of Perth, and 5.5 miles west of Coupar Angus, close to the River Tay. Wikipedia

Waldorf-Astoria Hotel.label: Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts
Waldorf-Astoria Hotel.description: Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts is a Hilton Worldwide luxury hotel and resort brand. It is positioned as the flagship brand within Hilton's portfolio, being used on hotels which offer the highest standards of facilities and service. Wikipedia

American Colony Hotel.label: American Colony Hotel
American Colony Hotel.description: The American Colony Hotel is a luxury hotel located in a historic building in Jerusalem which previously housed the utopian American-Swedish community known as the American Colony. Wikipedia

Badrutt's Palace Hotel.label: Badrutt's Palace Hotel
Badrutt's Palace Hotel.description:
Badrutt's Palace Hotel is an historic, internationally known luxury hotel in St Moritz, Switzerland.
The existing Hotel Beau Rivage was purchased by Caspar Badrutt in 1892. Wikipedia

Balmoral Hotel.label: Balmoral Hotel
Balmoral Hotel.description: The Balmoral is a luxury five-star hotel and landmark in Edinburgh, Scotland, known as the North British Hotel until the late 1980s. Wikipedia

Breidenbacher Hof.label: Breidenbacher Hof
Breidenbacher Hof.description: Breidenbacher Hof is a 5-Star Capella Hotel in Düsseldorf, Germany, located on the Königsallee in the Carlstadt. Wikipedia

Clarion Hotel, Limerick.label: Clarion Hotel, Limerick
Clarion Hotel, Limerick.description: The Clarion is a 17 storey hotel located beside the River Shannon on Steamboat Quay in Limerick. Part of the Clarion Hotel brand, which in turn is part of the Choice Hotels group, it is one of two ... Wikipedia

Dom-Hotel.label: Dom-Hotel
Dom-Hotel.description: The Dom-Hotel is a 5-Star Hotel in Cologne, Germany, located on Roncalliplatz in Innenstadt. The hotel is named after Cologne Cathedral, which is its direct neighbour. Wikipedia

Don Chan Palace.label: Don Chan Palace
Don Chan Palace.description: Don Chan Palace is a hotel in Vientiane, Laos, established in 2004. The hotel is the tallest building in the city at 14 storeys. Wikipedia

Don CeSar.label: Don CeSar
Don CeSar.description: Loews Don CeSar Hotel is a Loews hotel located in St. Pete Beach, Florida, in the United States. Developed by Thomas Rowe and opened in 1928, it gained renown as the Gulf playground for America's pampered ... Wikipedia

Hotel Astoria (Copenhagen).label: Hotel Astoria
Hotel Astoria (Copenhagen).description: Hotel Astoria is a design hotel located next to the Central Station in Copenhagen, Denmark. The building is an early example of Functionalist architecture in Denmark. Wikipedia

Hotel Berolina.label: Hotel Berolina
Hotel Berolina.description: Hotel Berolina was a hotel in Berlin, Germany which existed from 1963 to 1996 and was set back from the road behind the front Kino International. Wikipedia

Hotel Icon.label: Hotel ICON
Hotel Icon.description: Hotel ICON is the teaching and research hotel built for the School of Hotel and Tourism Management by the Hong Kong Polytechnic University at 17 Science Museum Road, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Kowloon, Hong Kong. Wikipedia

Excelsior Hotel Ernst.label: Excelsior Hotel Ernst
Excelsior Hotel Ernst.description: The Excelsior Hotel Ernst with a view of Cologne Cathedral, the Dom, was built in 1863. Carl Ernst was the constructor and first owner of the hotel, which was formerly called "Hotel Ernst". Wikipedia

Llanwenarth House.label: Llanwenarth House
Llanwenarth House.description: Llanwenarth House is a small country house, now a hotel, located off the B4246 road, west of Govilon and Llanfoist, just south of Abergavenny in the Usk valley of Monmouthshire, Wales. Wikipedia

Luton Hoo.label: Luton Hoo
Luton Hoo.description: Luton Hoo is an English country house and estate between the towns of Luton, Bedfordshire and Harpenden, Hertfordshire. Most of the estate lies within the civil parish of Hyde, Bedfordshire. Wikipedia

Swissôtel The Stamford.label: Swissôtel The Stamford
Swissôtel The Stamford.description: Swissôtel The Stamford, is a luxury hotel in Singapore managed by Swissôtel Hotels & Resorts. Designed by architect I.M. Pei, Swissôtel The Stamford, at a height of 226 metres is one of Southeast Asia’s tallest hotels. Wikipedia

Tirana International Hotel.label: Tirana International Hotel
Tirana International Hotel.description: Tirana International Hotel is an international hotel located between the central Skanderbeg Square and the Zogu I Boulevard in central Tirana, Albania. Wikipedia

The Algonquin.label: The Algonquin Hotel Times Square, Autograph Collection

Westin Bonaventure Hotel.label: The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles

42 The Calls (Hotel).label: 42 The Calls
42 The Calls (Hotel).description: 42 The Calls is a 4-star hotel with 41 rooms. The hotel is located in Leeds opposite Leeds Parish Church and near to Leeds Corn Exchange. Wikipedia

Abbasi Hotel.label: Abbasi Hotel
Abbasi Hotel.description: The Abbasi Hotel is a hotel located in Isfahan, Iran. This complex was built at the time of king Sultan Husayn of Safavid about 300 years ago. It was built as a caravansary to provide lodging for passengers. Wikipedia

Adriatik Hotel.label: Adriatik Hotel
Adriatik Hotel.description: Adriatik Hotel is a hotel near Durrës, Albania. This is the main tourist hotel in Durrës, located on the long sandy beach to the south. Wikipedia

Allegro Papagayo.label: Allegro PapagayoOccidental Allegro Papagayo All Inclusive
Allegro Papagayo.description:
Allegro Papagayo is an all-inclusive resort that is located in Costa Rica's Gulf of Papagayo.
The Four Seasons and the Fiesta Resorts are in the same neighborhood. The resort has 300 rooms with rates of up to $150 per night. Wikipedia

Al Deira Hotel.label: Al Deira Hotel
Al Deira Hotel.description: The Al Deira Hotel is a beach hotel located in Gaza. It was built in 2000 and has 22 rooms which feature high, domed ceilings and views of the Mediterranean. The hotel is regularly used by foreign journalists covering Gaza. Wikipedia

Aloft Washington National Harbor.label: Aloft Washington National Harbor
Aloft Washington National Harbor.description: The Aloft Washington National Harbor is a hotel located on National Harbor near Oxon Hill, Maryland. Wikipedia

Amanjiwo.label: Amanjiwo
Amanjiwo.description: Amanjiwo is a luxury hotel in the Menoreh Hills near Magelang, Central Java, Indonesia. It lies opposite the 9th century Buddhist sanctuary and UNESCO World Heritage Site, Borobudur. It is operated by Aman Resorts and was opened in 1997. Wikipedia

Amankila.label: Amankila
Amankila.description: Amankila is a luxury coastal hotel situated on the green hill of Indrakila, near Manggis in Karangasem Regency in eastern Bali, Indonesia. Wikipedia

Amantaka.label: Amantaka
Amantaka.description: Amantaka is a luxury hotel in Luang Prabang, Laos. The hotel, located in a French colonial former hospital, is operated by Aman Resorts and opened in September 2009. Wikipedia

Ananda–In the Himalayas.label: Ananda–In the Himalayas
Ananda–In the Himalayas.description: Ananda in the Himalayas is a luxury destination spa in Narendra Nagar, Uttarakhand, set in the Indian Himalayas. Wikipedia

Antlers Hotel (Kingsland, Texas).label: Antlers Hotel
Antlers Hotel (Kingsland, Texas).description: The Antlers Hotel is a hotel and resort built in 1901 by the Austin and Northwestern Railroad on the Colorado River in Kingsland in Llano County in Central Texas. After a brief heyday, The Antlers closed in 1923 and fell into disrepair. Wikipedia

Astoria Palace Hotel.label: Astoria Palace Hotel
Astoria Palace Hotel.description: The Astoria Palace Hotel is a hotel in Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. It faces the Copacabana Beach and is located just metres west of the Copacabana Palace Hotel. It is one of the newest hotels in the area and has 115 rooms. Wikipedia

Avari Towers.label: Avari Towers
Avari Towers.description:
The Avari Towers hotel is situated on Shahrah-Fatima Jinnah, in Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan.
Avari Towers hotel is one of the major hotels in Pakistan. Wikipedia

Avalon hotel (Gothenburg).label: Avalon hotel
Avalon hotel (Gothenburg).description: The Avalon hotel is a hotel at Kungsportsplatsen in Gothenburg, Sweden. It was nominated for the Kasper Salin Prize in 2007. It is part of Design Hotels AG. Wikipedia

Austria Classic Hotel Wien.label: Austria Classic Hotel Wien
Austria Classic Hotel Wien.description: The Austria Classic Hotel Wien is a three-star hotel, located on Praterstraße in Vienna's second district, the Leopoldstadt. It is a member of the Austria Classic Hotels group and was named Hotel Nordbahn until a rebranding in January 2008. Wikipedia

Ban Pako.label: Ban Pako
Ban Pako.description: Ban Pako, also known as Ban Pako Eco Resort, is an ecotourist resort lodge and ancient site along the Nam Ngum River, approximately 50 kilometres northeast of Vientiane, Laos. Wikipedia

Basin Harbor Club.label: Basin Harbor Club
Basin Harbor Club.description: Basin Harbor Club is an Historic resort on Lake Champlain in Vergennes, Vermont. With several onsite dining options, activities ranging from water sports, golf, tennis, hiking, biking and quaint ... Wikipedia

Bear Hotel (Oxfordshire).label: Bear Hotel
Bear Hotel (Oxfordshire).description: The Bear Hotel is a hotel in Woodstock, Oxfordshire, located opposite The Oxfordshire Museum, not far from Blenheim Palace. It is one of England's original 13th century coaching inns and has stone walls, oak beams, open fireplaces and an ivy facade. Wikipedia

Bedford Hotel (Brighton).label: Bedford Hotel
Bedford Hotel (Brighton).description: The Bedford Hotel was a hotel on the seafront in Brighton, England which has subsequently been renamed the Holiday Inn Brighton after becoming a part of the Holiday Inn business. Wikipedia

Beau-Rivage Geneva.label: Beau-Rivage Geneva
Beau-Rivage Geneva.description: Beau-Rivage Geneva is a five-star luxury hotel, founded in 1865 by the Mayer family. It is located in Geneva, in Switzerland. Wikipedia

Bella Sky Hotel.label: Bella Sky Comwell Hotel
Bella Sky Hotel.description: The Bella Sky Comwell Hotel is a 4-star conference hotel adjacent to the Bella Convention and Congress Center in the Ørestad district of Copenhagen, Denmark. With 814 rooms, it is the largest hotel in Scandinavia. Wikipedia

Bishopstrow House.label: Bishopstrow House
Bishopstrow House.description: Bishopstrow House, currently occupied by the Bishopstrow House Hotel, is a late Georgian English country house standing near the B3414 in the parish of Bishopstrow, about a mile east of Warminster, Wiltshire. Wikipedia

Blue Swallow Motel.label: Blue Swallow Motel
Blue Swallow Motel.description: The Blue Swallow Court in Tucumcari, New Mexico, United States, is a 12-unit L-shaped motel listed on the National Register of Historic Places in New Mexico as a part of historic U.S. Route 66. Wikipedia

Bodysgallen Hall.label: Bodysgallen Hall
Bodysgallen Hall.description: Bodysgallen Hall is a manor house in Conwy county borough, north Wales, near the village of Llanrhos. Since 2008 the house has been owned by The National Trust. It is a grade I listed building, and is currently used as a hotel. Wikipedia

Bogotá Marriott Hotel.label: Bogotá Marriott Hotel
Bogotá Marriott Hotel.description: The Bogotá Marriott Hotel is the first hotel from Marriott International to open in Colombia. It was inaugurated on October 2009. The Bogotá Marriott Hotel and Corporate Center is located in the Av. Wikipedia

Braye Beach Hotel.label: Braye Beach Hotel
Braye Beach Hotel.description: Braye Beach Hotel is a 4-star hotel, considered to be the best in Alderney. The white hotel lies near the Braye Harbour on the beach in St Anne, Alderney. Wikipedia

Britannia Adelphi Hotel.label: Britannia Adelphi Hotel
Britannia Adelphi Hotel.description: The Britannia Adelphi Hotel is located at Ranelagh Place, Liverpool city centre, Merseyside, England. The present building is the third hotel on the site, and is designated by English Heritage as Grade II listed building. Wikipedia

British Colonial Hilton Nassau.label: British Colonial Hilton Nassau
British Colonial Hilton Nassau.description: The British Colonial Hilton Nassau is a luxury five-star or AAA four-diamond colonial hotel in downtown Nassau, Bahamas, located on the only private beach in Nassau, on the site of the Old Fort of ... Wikipedia

Boots Motel.label: Boots Court Motel
Boots Motel.description: The Boots Motel, a historic U.S. Route 66 motor hotel in Carthage, Missouri, opened in 1939 as the Boots Court at 107 S. Garrison Avenue. Wikipedia

Boston Harbor Hotel.label: Boston Harbor Hotel at Rowes Wharf
Boston Harbor Hotel.description: The Boston Harbor Hotel is a high-end luxury hotel overlooking Boston Harbor and the Rose Kennedy Greenway. The hotel is also a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts Worldwide. Wikipedia

Brookstreet Hotel.label: Brookstreet Hotel
Brookstreet Hotel.description: The Brookstreet Hotel is a modern luxury hotel in the Kanata suburb of the City of Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, located north of the Queensway, near the intersection of March Road and Carling Avenue, in ... Wikipedia
